system.description:
A master gunner who works with Kadanay jade and clay to destroy the victim of their scorn, imbuing their weapons with the essence of gods.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: God Annihilating Laser. Attack an enemy in range 7 with Faith, dazzling.

Gambits [[/r d10]]

1-3: Rush > Rush > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > Nephrite Idol [1]: Choose a tile in range 4. An idol (object, size 1) arises from it. Any attack by the Astra can start from the idol > Inflict Violence

7-9: Rush > Godly Gleam [2]: Attack all enemies in blast 4 with Faith, dazzling and setting aflame.

10: Summon Heaven To Earth [3]: Attack any enemy in the battlefield with Bravery + Faith.

traits.name: Conviction
traits.description: All Folk have a reason for fighting, and if reasoned to, can cause them to rethink combat. However, they will fight for their Conviction until it looks like all is bleak.

traits.name: Morale
traits.description: At the beginning of any Resound where there are twice as many Kadungganan than there are enemies (eg., If there are 4 Kadungganan and 2 Enemies left) all Folk enemies will Surrender, becoming Defeated.

traits.name: Turn The Wheel
traits.description: At the beginning of every Resound, all Ba-enense fighters gain 1 Merit, which they can gain up to 3 of. All Ba-enense add their current Merit as attack dice.

traits.name: Ruminate Emptiness
traits.description: As long as the astra has merit, they gain +1 range to all ranged attacks and their attacks are Skewering. When making a ranged attack, can spend 1 Merit to increase the range to the entire battlefield.
